summary: Implement a plugin system for the PHP SDK to allow users to create custom integrations with Temporal Workflows, similar to the existing Python implementation.
userImpact: Users will be able to create custom integrations and extensions for Temporal workflows without modifying core SDK code.
proposedFix: Implement plugin system based on Python SDK plugin implementation
resolutionDetails: Plugin system implemented following Python SDK pattern
keyQuote: Implement Plugins so that users can self-serve creating integrations with Temporal Workflows. This is done in Python and we can copy.
